customFields.Priority P1 to P4: P2 - Core Functions (Do core functions work?)

inline.expectedResult:
• Emoji picker icon does not appear on:
    • Message box in center or RHS or
    • Reactions on messages in center or RHS
  • If a post already has a reaction, the `+` to add another reaction does not appear on hover
  • If a post already has a reaction, the user can click it to add/remove their reaction that way
  • Emoji can still be added by typing :emojiname: or reactions by typing +:emojiname:

customFields.Related ticket(s): Note there is a ticket to remove this setting from System Console entirely: v6.0: Remove the emoji picker system console setting — MM-11671
customFields.Important notes about this step: Expected that it does not disable in RN apps on long-press.
